timeline.author: sbordet

replies.bodyText:
@sbordet ServletContextHandler is not always a terminal handler.
All ContextHandler must first match a request before they continue handling it. They reject a match because of context path and/or virtual host and/or named connector.  Even if a request matches the context, it can still be returned unhandled if the ServletHandler is configured to have no default.
